  • Element
org.mayanjun.mybatisx.api.annotation

Annotation Type Column


  • @Retention(value=RUNTIME)
 @Target(value=FIELD)
public @interface Column
    用来定义数据库类字段和数据库表字段之间的映射。 A Column used to annotate a field that mapped to a column of table in database
    Since:
    0.0.1
    Author:
    mayanjun(8/19/15)

    • Optional Element Summary

      Optional Elements 
      Modifier and Type Optional Element and Description
      String comment
      字段注释信息 Specified the comment
      String defaultValue
      定义默认值。如果默认值为空，则默认值去数据类型中定义的默认值。 Specified the default value to this column.
      String length
      定义字段长度，内容和SQL DDL中的长度定义一样 Specifies the SQL DDL length expression
      boolean notNull
      定义字段是否可为空 Specifies whether the NULL value be allowed on this column
      String referenceField
      当一个@Table对象引用另一个@Table对象时，我们可以通过这个字段指定外键引用。 Specifies the reference field when a column field is referenced to an EntityBean.
      DataType type
      数据类型 The data type of database
      boolean unsigned
      如果是数字，定义是否是无符号数据类型 Specifies whether the numeric data type is unsigned
      String value
      字段名称 The column name, by default uses the field name

    • Element Detail

      • value

        public abstract String value
        字段名称 The column name, by default uses the field name
        Returns:
        column name
        Default:
        ""

      • type

        public abstract DataType type
        数据类型 The data type of database
        Returns:
        data type
        Default:
        org.mayanjun.mybatisx.api.enums.DataType.VARCHAR

      • unsigned

        public abstract boolean unsigned
        如果是数字，定义是否是无符号数据类型 Specifies whether the numeric data type is unsigned
        Returns:
        boolean
        Default:
        false

      • length

        public abstract String length
        定义字段长度，内容和SQL DDL中的长度定义一样 Specifies the SQL DDL length expression
        Returns:
        length definition
        Default:
        ""

      • notNull

        public abstract boolean notNull
        定义字段是否可为空 Specifies whether the NULL value be allowed on this column
        Returns:
        true if null value not be allowed
        Default:
        true

      • defaultValue

        public abstract String defaultValue
        定义默认值。如果默认值为空，则默认值去数据类型中定义的默认值。 Specified the default value to this column. The default value defined in DataType will be used.
        Returns:
        the default value for this column
        Default:
        ""

      • comment

        public abstract String comment
        字段注释信息 Specified the comment
        Returns:
        comments for column
        Default:
        ""

      • referenceField

        public abstract String referenceField
        当一个@Table对象引用另一个@Table对象时，我们可以通过这个字段指定外键引用。 Specifies the reference field when a column field is referenced to an EntityBean. When the referenceField is specified, the query parse will generate a select field with 'AS' clause for this field. For example, consider the following declare: 
             @Column(type = DataType.BIGINT, comment = "项目ID", referenceField = "id")
     private Subject subject;
        the selected field will be: subject AS `subject.id`
        Returns:
        reference field name
        Default:
        ""
